content: Standardization of withdrawal options for Thrift Savings Plan participants. Amendment to the Thrift Savings Plan participation rules includes changes to contribution eligibility and separation from government employment. Redundant paragraphs are removed and others are renumbered for clarity. Amendment to the Thrift Savings Plan participation rules allows for the payment of nonforfeitable account balances of $3,500 or less to be made in a single payment upon separation from Government employment.
